title: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson flaunts her abs in a lacy bralet as she joins band in striking photoshoot
text:
Her confidence has grown since her cyber bullying documentary, The Odd Out, broke BBC Three records.

And Little Mix's Jesy Nelson put on a fierce display as she joined her bandmates for a striking black and white photoshoot for House of Solo magazine.

The singer, 28, flaunted her washboard abs in a black lace bralet, while Perrie Edwards, 26, slipped into a leather minidress with ruffle detailing.

Stunning: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson put on a fierce display as she joined her bandmates for a striking black and white photoshoot for House of Solo magazine

Leigh-Anne Pinnock, 28, and Jade Thirlwall, 26, also brought the glamour also they showed off their sartorial prowess in the moody shot.

Jesy showcased her ample cleavage and numerous arm inkings in the plunging lace bra, which she teamed with high-waisted black and white striped trousers.

With her hair styled in long tumbling curls, Jesy put on a sultry display as she posed up a storm for the camera.

Smouldering: Perrie Edwards, 26, wowed as she slipped into a leather minidress with ruffle detailing

Sizzling display: Slipping into fishnet stockings, Leigh-Anne turned up the heat in a black vinyl trench coat, which she seductively wore off the shoulder

Slipping into fishnet stockings, Leigh-Anne turned up the heat in a black vinyl trench coat, which she seductively wore off the shoulder.

The Woman Like Me hitmaker looked effortlessly cool as she accessorised the look with gold hoop earrings and wore her hair in a long braid.

Jade also looked stylish in an oversized denim jacket, which was embellished with silver studs.

Sartorially-savvy: Jade also put on a stylish display in an oversized denim jacket, which was embellished with silver studs

The stunning photoshoot comes just days after they confirmed reports they are to launch a Saturday night TV show which will rival Simon Cowell's X Factor.

The BBC One show, named Little Mix The Search, will see talented singers become members of all-female, all-male or mixed bands and then compete.

The winning group will then join the mega-selling girl band on their summer tour in 2020, setting the show apart from Simon's show, which does not offer a similar perk.

The girls will become mentors to the competitors, who can enter as a duo, a three or a four-piece.

Powerful: The stunning photoshoot comes just days after they confirmed reports they are to launch a Saturday night TV show which will rival Simon Cowell's X Factor

The group told BBC Radio 1's Nick Grimshaw last Thursday they are looking for the 'next big band'.

Perrie said: 'People can be taken out as well. It's pretty brutal.'

Speaking of the enticing prize of joining the girl band on the 2020 tour, Grimshaw said: 'That's a mega prize because you guys are really good at being in a group, like the best.'

Covergirl: Little Mix star on four special covers of House of Solo's Beauty issue - out later this week

The group, who are currently touring the UK with the LM5 tour, have been crowned X Factor's richest winners, as each member of the quartet are said to have earned £1.6 million each.

The Sun reports accounts made available on Companies House on Tuesday, show Little Mix double their earnings last year from 1.74 million in 2017 to £3.93 million.

Their tour company is said to have profits of £5million, bringing their total earnings to £8.93 million in 2018.

And the band are going from strength-to-strength after Jesy's Odd One Out documentary broke BBC Three records.

The programme, which emotionally explores the Little Mix star's horrific trolling ordeal and suicide attempt, is the highest 16-34 viewed programme on BBC One this year in peak time, the BBC has said.

Little Mix star on four special covers of House of Solo's Beauty issue - out later this week.
description: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson put on a fierce display as she joined her bandmates for a striking black and white photoshoot for House of Solo magazine.
